name: Engineering Portfolio V1.0
headline: First adventure into web design and development
description:
(Note: The website does not exist anymore.)

At some point in the middle of a job hunt several years ago, one of my applications asked for a portfolio. Instead of following the boring route of throwing together some stuff in a PDF, I opted to learn web design & development to create my own site. This was the result and the beginning of my journey into web development.
